Confirm message appears: "You're on the Free plan - Upgrade anytime"
Test Free Plan functionality

description: Entry-level paid features for small teams.
steps: Navigate to Basic Plan feature
Confirm message appears: "Basic plan: $5.49/user/month (annual)"
Test Basic Plan functionality

description: Mid-tier plan with approval workflows.
steps: Navigate to Standard Plan feature
Confirm message appears: "Standard plan: $7.99/user/month (annual)"
Test Standard Plan functionality

description: Advanced features for growing teams.
steps: Navigate to Pro Plan feature
Confirm message appears: "Pro plan: $9.99/user/month (annual)"
Test Pro Plan functionality

description: Full-featured plan for large organizations.
steps: Navigate to Enterprise Plan feature
Confirm message appears: "Enterprise plan: $11.99/user/month (annual)"
Test Enterprise Plan functionality

description: Per-user pricing model.
steps: Navigate to User Licenses feature
Confirm message appears: "25 active users × $9.99 = $249.75/month"
Test User Licenses functionality

description: Upgrade or downgrade subscription.
steps: Navigate to Plan Changes feature
Confirm message appears: "Upgraded to Pro plan - New features active now"
Test Plan Changes functionality

description: Accepted payment options.
steps: Navigate to Payment Methods feature
Confirm message appears: "Payment method updated"
Test Payment Methods functionality

description: Test paid features before committing.

Confirm message appears: "Pro plan trial: 14 days remaining"

description: Seamless upgrade from Free plan.
